title: False Peace
timeline: Morning of the exposure, 0700-0745 station time

knows: This is the last good morning, though she doesn't fully realize it
Her instincts are still screaming danger
She should run but is choosing to stay
Jax told her he loves her 'whatever happens'
She's walking toward her own execution
She's at the medical clinic when broadcast hits
Elara Quinn.emotional_state: Foreboding, trying to memorize happiness, trapped, resigned, terrified

He planned a romantic evening with Elara for tonight

knows: She's tired, old, lungs failing

revealed_to_reader: The last peaceful morning before everything breaks
Elara knew something was coming but stayed anyway
Jax planned romantic evening for tonight (won't happen)
Jax told Elara 'I love you, whatever happens' - prophetic
At 0745, all screens in Free Level activate simultaneously
Exposure broadcast shows Elara Quinn's SSS ID photo

Broadcast states she's Alpha SSS investigator on surveillance op
Community center erupts in anger and betrayal
Residents want to find her, violence implied
Jax realizes the ID photo is really her
Jax is devastated, world cracking apart
Jax runs toward medical clinic to find her
Chapter ends on cliffhanger: what happens when he reaches her?

planted.significance: Elara will have to flee for her life

planted.element: Finn's 'whatever happens, I've got your back' to Jax
